csdl.jupiter.file
Class PrefResource

java.lang.Object
  csdl.jupiter.file.PrefResource

public class PrefResource
extends java.lang.Object

Provides data-filled manager objects. Clients can pass an object to get proper data.

Version:
$Id: PrefResource.java,v 1.6 2005/03/28 14:39:52 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita
